title: Cold
data:
***Version [0.30](/0.30 "0.30")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

**Cold** is one of the most common elemental forces you will encounter as you explore the [Dungeon](/Dungeon "Dungeon"), consisting of ice-themed and otherwise cool attacks.

## Contents

- [1 Cold Damage](#Cold_Damage)
- [2 Cold Resistance](#Cold_Resistance)
  - [2.1 Cold Vulnerability](#Cold_Vulnerability)
- [3 See Also](#See_Also)

## Cold Damage

Characters have many ways to gain cold damage. [Ice Magic](/Ice_Magic "Ice Magic") is the most evident, but just about any character can use [freezing](/Freezing "Freezing")-branded weapons or a [wand of iceblast](/Wand_of_iceblast "Wand of iceblast").

Cold damage is reduced by cold resistance (rC+). [Cold-blooded](/Cold-blooded "Cold-blooded") creatures, including player [Draconians](/Draconian "Draconian"), are [slowed](/Slow "Slow") by a few specific cold attacks: weapons of [freezing](/Freezing "Freezing"), [Freeze](/Freeze "Freeze"), [Frozen Ramparts](/Frozen_Ramparts "Frozen Ramparts"), [freezing vapours](/Freezing_vapour "Freezing vapour"), [Ozocubu's Refrigeration](/Ozocubu%27s_Refrigeration "Ozocubu's Refrigeration"). Having rC+ negates being cold-blooded.

## Cold Resistance

The cold resistance intrinsic significantly reduces the cold damage you take when attacked:

| Resistance Level | Damage Taken (Player) | Damage Taken (Monster) |
| ---------------- | --------------------- | ---------------------- |
| 1                | 50%                   | 50%                    |
| 2                | 33%                   | 20%                    |
| 3                | 20%                   | 0%                     |

You can acquire cold resistance from a number of sources:

**Item**

- [Ring of protection from cold](/Ring_of_protection_from_cold "Ring of protection from cold") and [ring of ice](/Ring_of_ice "Ring of ice"): rC+
- Armour of [cold resistance](/Ego "Ego"): rC+
- [Gold dragon scales](/Gold_dragon_scales "Gold dragon scales"): rC+
- [Ice dragon scales](/Ice_dragon_scales "Ice dragon scales"): rC++
- [Staff of cold](/Staff_of_cold "Staff of cold"): rC+
- [Potion of resistance](/Potion_of_resistance "Potion of resistance"): rC+, temporary
- [Tiamat](/Tiamat "Tiamat")'s [dragonskin cloak](/Dragonskin_cloak "Dragonskin cloak") (50% chance per attack of rC+)
- [Randarts](/Randart "Randart"): rC+ to rC+++

**Character**

- Being a white [draconian](/Draconian "Draconian"): rC+
- [Cold Resistance](/Good_mutations#Cold_Resistance "Good mutations") [mutation](/Mutation "Mutation"): rC+/rank
- The third rank of the [Shaggy Fur](/Good_mutations#Shaggy_Fur "Good mutations") mutation: rC+
- The third rank of the [Icy Blue Scales](/Good_mutations#Icy_Blue_Scales "Good mutations") mutation: rC+
- Being a [ghoul](/Ghoul "Ghoul"), [mummy](/Mummy "Mummy"), or bloodless [vampire](/Vampire "Vampire"): rC+
- [Necromutation](/Necromutation "Necromutation"): rC+
- [Ice Form](/Ice_Form "Ice Form"): rC+++

### Cold Vulnerability

Cold vulnerability causes you to take x150% normal damage from most cold attacks, and x200% damage from freezing melee attacks. You can acquire it by:

- Wearing a [fire dragon scales](/Fire_dragon_scales "Fire dragon scales") or [ring of fire](/Ring_of_fire "Ring of fire")

- [Dragon Form](/Dragon_Form "Dragon Form") (except for non-red [Draconians](/Draconian "Draconian"))

- The Cold Vulnerability [mutation](/Mutation "Mutation").

- Certain [unrand](/Unrand "Unrand") artefacts:

  - [![Amulet of elemental vulnerability.png](/images/0/02/Amulet_of_elemental_vulnerability.png)](/File:Amulet_of_elemental_vulnerability.png) **[Amulet of Elemental Vulnerability](/Amulet_of_Elemental_Vulnerability "Amulet of Elemental Vulnerability")**
  - [![Salamander hide armour.png](/images/f/f9/Salamander_hide_armour.png)](/File:Salamander_hide_armour.png) **[Salamander hide armour](/Salamander_hide_armour "Salamander hide armour")**

## See Also

[List of cold resistant monsters](/Category:Cold_resistance "Category:Cold resistance")

[List of cold vulnerable monsters](/Category:Cold_vulnerability "Category:Cold vulnerability")
html:
Cold

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.30: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.

Cold is one of the most common elemental forces you will encounter as you explore the Dungeon, consisting of ice-themed and otherwise cool attacks.

Contents

  • 1 Cold Damage
  • 2 Cold Resistance
    • 2.1 Cold Vulnerability
  • 3 See Also

Cold Damage

Characters have many ways to gain cold damage. Ice Magic is the most evident, but just about any character can use freezing-branded weapons or a wand of iceblast.

Cold damage is reduced by cold resistance (rC+). Cold-blooded creatures, including player Draconians, are slowed by a few specific cold attacks: weapons of freezing, Freeze, Frozen Ramparts, freezing vapours, Ozocubu's Refrigeration. Having rC+ negates being cold-blooded.

Cold Resistance

The cold resistance intrinsic significantly reduces the cold damage you take when attacked:

Resistance Level Damage Taken (Player) Damage Taken (Monster)
1 50% 50%
2 33% 20%
3 20% 0%

You can acquire cold resistance from a number of sources:

Item

  • Ring of protection from cold and ring of ice: rC+
  • Armour of cold resistance: rC+
  • Gold dragon scales: rC+
  • Ice dragon scales: rC++
  • Staff of cold: rC+
  • Potion of resistance: rC+, temporary
  • Tiamat's dragonskin cloak (50% chance per attack of rC+)
  • Randarts: rC+ to rC+++

Character

  • Being a white draconian: rC+
  • Cold Resistance mutation: rC+/rank
  • The third rank of the Shaggy Fur mutation: rC+
  • The third rank of the Icy Blue Scales mutation: rC+
  • Being a ghoul, mummy, or bloodless vampire: rC+
  • Necromutation: rC+
  • Ice Form: rC+++

Cold Vulnerability

Cold vulnerability causes you to take x150% normal damage from most cold attacks, and x200% damage from freezing melee attacks. You can acquire it by:

  • Wearing a fire dragon scales or ring of fire
  • Dragon Form (except for non-red Draconians)
  • The Cold Vulnerability mutation.
  • Certain unrand artefacts:
    • Amulet of Elemental Vulnerability
    • Salamander hide armour

See Also

List of cold resistant monsters

List of cold vulnerable monsters

{{version030}}
'''Cold''' is one of the most common elemental forces you will encounter as you explore the [[Dungeon]], consisting of ice-themed and otherwise cool attacks.

==Cold Damage==
Characters have many ways to gain cold damage. [[Ice Magic]] is the most evident, but just about any character can use [[freezing]]-branded weapons or a [[wand of iceblast]]. 

Cold damage is reduced by cold resistance (rC+). [[Cold-blooded]] creatures, including player [[Draconian]]s, are [[slow]]ed by a few specific cold attacks: weapons of [[freezing]], [[Freeze]], [[Frozen Ramparts]], [[freezing vapour]]s, [[Ozocubu's Refrigeration]]. Having rC+ negates being cold-blooded.

==Cold Resistance==
The cold resistance intrinsic significantly reduces the cold damage you take when attacked:

{| class="wikitable"
! Resistance Level !! Damage Taken (Player) !! Damage Taken (Monster)
|-
| 1 || 50% || 50%
|-
| 2 || 33% || 20%
|-
| 3 || 20% || 0%
|}

You can acquire cold resistance from a number of sources:

'''Item'''
*[[Ring of protection from cold]] and [[ring of ice]]: rC+
*Armour of [[ego|cold resistance]]: rC+
*[[Gold dragon scales]]: rC+
*[[Ice dragon scales]]: rC++
*[[Staff of cold]]: rC+
*[[Potion of resistance]]: rC+, temporary
*[[Tiamat]]'s [[dragonskin cloak]] (50% chance per attack of rC+)
*[[Randart]]s: rC+ to rC+++

'''Character'''
*Being a white [[draconian]]: rC+
*[[Good mutations#Cold Resistance|Cold Resistance]] [[mutation]]: rC+/rank
*The third rank of the [[Good mutations#Shaggy Fur|Shaggy Fur]] mutation: rC+
*The third rank of the [[Good mutations#Icy Blue Scales|Icy Blue Scales]] mutation: rC+
*Being a [[ghoul]], [[mummy]], or bloodless [[vampire]]: rC+
*[[Necromutation]]: rC+
*[[Ice Form]]: rC+++

===Cold Vulnerability===
Cold vulnerability causes you to take x150% normal damage from most cold attacks, and x200% damage from freezing melee attacks. You can acquire it by:

*Wearing a [[fire dragon scales]] or [[ring of fire]]
*[[Dragon Form]] (except for non-red [[Draconian]]s)
*The Cold Vulnerability [[mutation]].
*Certain [[unrand]] artefacts:
**{{Unrandlink|Amulet of Elemental Vulnerability}}
**{{Unrandlink|Salamander hide armour}}
